name: alluxio-enterprise
description:
Alluxio Enterprise Edition (AEE). Please obtain a license by visiting: https://alluxio.com/products 

 Alluxio, formerly Tachyon, is the world's first system that unifies disparate storage systems at memory speed. With Alluxio, enterprises can manage data efficiently, accelerate business analytics, and ease the adoption of hybrid cloud. 

 Please refer to https://alluxio.com/docs/ for a detailed operation guide.
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Alluxio is being installed!

	Documentation: https://alluxio.com/docs/ 
	Issues: info@aluxio.com
